meanings.definition: A Japanese gambling game resembling pinball
meanings.sent1: At the arcade, I played pachinko with my friends.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy playing pachinko in Japan.
meanings.sent3: The loud noise of the pachinko balls bouncing is quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like a game of pachinko, with unpredictable twists and turns.
meanings.sent5: The colorful lights and sounds of the pachinko machine were mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: A machine used for playing pachinko
meanings.sent1: The pachinko machine was filled with shiny balls.
meanings.sent2: Players insert coins into the pachinko machine to start the game.
meanings.sent3: The old pachinko machine made funny noises when the balls dropped.
meanings.sent4: The pachinko machine hummed like a busy bee in the arcade.
meanings.sent5: Winning at the pachinko machine brought a sense of accomplishment.

meanings.definition: A place where pachinko is played
meanings.sent1: The pachinko parlor was crowded with players.
meanings.sent2: We visited the local pachinko to try our luck.
meanings.sent3: The pachinko place had a unique smell of excitement and anticipation.
meanings.sent4: The pachinko hall buzzed with energy as players focused on their games.
meanings.sent5: In the corner of the pachinko room, a lucky player celebrated a big win.
